org.gservlet

Class ContainerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gservlet.ContainerManager

  • public class ContainerManager
extends Object
    Manages the registration and the reloading of a servlet, filter or listener into the web container
    Author:
    Mamadou Lamine Ba

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The servlet context object

      The script manager object
